author: jim
msg: Some APACI/configure tweaks to accomodate old
shells. Also, we had been clobbering IFS, which looks
like it had been harmless, but it's still not good

msg: UUencode in ab has also been updated. Though I seriously doubt
if ab has ever been tested in an EBCDIC environment :-) Does it

author: martin
msg: Not every ANSI compliant compiler supports auto-arrays of dynamic size.
Use defensive approach and allocate filename using ap_palloc().

author: martin
msg: Fix EBCDIC branch of ap_uudecode() which was broken by last commit.

msg: Fix an oversight in the string-termination procesing.
